header: The Best Program for Effective and Engaging School Education
subHeader: This is a modern online resource created for school students, teachers, and parents.
siteFeatures: Our site collects educational materials for all school subjects from grades 1 to 11
siteDescription: Here you will find a convenient structure covering all topics of the school curriculum, accessible for each grade.
feature1: Provide easy access to quality educational materials.
feature2: Simplify the preparation process for lessons, tests, and exams.
feature3: Help teachers find relevant resources for lessons.
feature4: Support parents in educating their children by providing clear materials on any topic.
brainypath_intro: OiOrda is a platform created to simplify and improve school education. Starting more than 10 years ago, we have grown into a resource that covers all subjects from 1st to 11th grade, helping thousands of students. üìö
mission_description: We strive to make knowledge accessible to everyone by offering high-quality materials that can be studied at a convenient pace and at any time. üåç
vision_description: We believe that knowledge should be accessible to everyone, regardless of location, opportunities, or resources. Innovation and continuous improvement are at the core of our work. We create learning conditions where students can easily delve into topics, and teachers and parents receive support at every stage. üí°
join_us: Join OiOrda and make learning interesting and accessible! üöÄ

name: Name
profile_hint: A short description for your profile.
contact_info_description: Contact information to reach you. These details will remain private.
password_hint: At least 8 characters. The password must include numbers, letters, and special characters.
help_prompt: How can we help you today?
help_description: Find a topic or question, review our FAQs and guides, or contact us for detailed support
faq_description: Here you will find frequently asked questions that can help you get started
faq_question_1: How do I access the application?
faq_answer_1: After purchasing, you will receive a unique login and password to use for access. Teachers are provided with a separate key for accessing their subjects.
faq_question_2: Can I use the application without an internet connection?
faq_answer_2: Yes, the application works fully offline after initial activation.
faq_question_3: Can I add my own materials to the application?
faq_answer_3: Currently, the application supports viewing provided materials only. However, we plan to introduce the ability to add user materials in future updates.
faq_question_4: Can I access materials for multiple grades?
faq_answer_4: Yes, the application allows you to view materials for all grades from 1st to 11th.
faq_question_5: What should I do if I forget my login or password?
faq_answer_5: You can restore access through the application's support service.
faq_question_6: Can I install the application on multiple devices?
faq_answer_6: Each key is tied to one device. To access it on another device, a new key is required.
news_item_1_title: 20% Growth in Interactive Whiteboard Usage in Schools in Kazakhstan
news_item_1_description: The use of interactive whiteboards in Kazakh schools has grown by 20%, making education more engaging and tech-savvy.
news_item_2_title: Popularity of Online Learning Among Schoolchildren
news_item_2_description: Online platforms like OiOrda help students learn remotely, providing access to materials anytime.
news_item_3_description: Modern schools are increasingly adopting personalized approaches to adapt education to each student's needs.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Here are the most common questions you can check before starting

question1.title: What are the benefits of using your platform for school education?
question1.answer: Our program offers interactive lessons, personalized study plans, and resources designed to enhance student engagement. We aim to make learning enjoyable and effective by providing access to various materials, including video lessons, tests, and additional assignments.

question2.title: How is user support provided?
question2.answer: We offer 24/7 user support via chat, email, and phone. If you have questions or problems using the platform, our team is always ready to help and respond to your inquiries.

question3.title: Can I use the platform on multiple devices?
question3.answer: Yes, you can use our platform on any internet-connected device, including computers, tablets, and smartphones. Your data will sync across devices, allowing you to continue learning from where you left off.

question4.title: What topics does your platform cover?
question4.answer: Our platform covers a wide range of topics, including mathematics, natural sciences, languages, and humanities. We continuously update our content to include the latest curricula and approaches, enabling students to study relevant materials.
